body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.8 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Substantial parts of inetcomm implemented (for Outlook).
Still better crypt32 support.
Memory management improvements.
Theming support for buttons.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
